action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ X ▢
X X X ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ X ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid where X's form a frame on the left side and corners, with additional X's in the second and fourth rows of the fourth column.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ X ▢ X ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢

DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with X's forming an inverted T shape. The top row has X's in the first and last positions. The second row has X's in the second and fourth positions. The middle column has X's from the third row to the bottom.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid where X's form a frame on the left side and corners, with additional X's in the second and fourth rows of the fourth column.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is there an X in the center position of your grid?
